name: Orbic Air, LLC
about: Orbic Air, LLC, based at the Burbank airport in Los Angeles, offers high-quality, personalized helicopter flight training. With over 20 years of experience and an impeccable safety record, our expert instructors provide training for various certifications, including Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, and Certified Flight Instructor. Our fleet includes the Robinson R22 Beta II and Robinson R44 Raven II, known for their superior performance and reliability. We cater to both aspiring professional pilots and private enthusiasts, ensuring one-on-one instruction tailored to individual needs and schedules. Safety is our top priority, and our aircraft are meticulously maintained to the highest standards. Choose Orbic Air for a comprehensive and safe flight training experience.
